Controlling other Apple devices using your iPhone

Getting an iPhone is great, but getting into the whole Apple ecosystem can be even better.

Provided you’ve signed into your iCloud account on all your Apple devices, you can effectively control what your other devices are doing using iPhone. You can basically turn your iPhone into the most powerful remote control ever!

How do you do this? Go into your Settings and go into the Accessibility section. Then you need to scroll down and go into the Control Nearby Devices section.

On the next screen, a list of compatible devices will appear. Select the device you want to connect your iPhone with.
